v.v: Those who trust in Yahweh are like Mount Zion,
As the hills that surround Jerusalem protect it,
Wicked people should not be allowed to rule over the land where righteous people live.
Yahweh, do good things to those who do good things to others
But when you punish the Israelites who no longer obey you,

v: which cannot be shaken or moved out of its place.
so Yahweh protects us, his people,
and he will protect us forever.
If they did that, those righteous people would think of doing wrong themselves.
and to those who sincerely obey your commands.
you will punish them the same as you punish all the other evildoers.
I wish that things may go well for people in Israel!
